summary: Modris, a 17-year-old, is like many teenagers in his small town. He has developed an addiction to gambling and is frequently in trouble. As his mother turns him to the police, now he struggles to keep out of jail.
cast: Kristers Piksa|Rezija Kalnina|Sabine Trumsina|Baiba Broka|Vilis Daudzins|Lauris Dzelzitis|Laura Jeruma|Januss Johansons|Lasma Kugrena|Inese Pudza|Kaspars Zvigulis
title: Modris
